name: Jumpboy World 64!!
description:
Help Jumpboy get up to his home! Collect coins, open chests and stomp legally distinct mushroom based monsters on the head to get XP and increase your stats!

Keyboard or Ps4/5 controller only, unfortunately. I may put up a separate build which is mapped to Xbox 360 controllers.
Controls:
Left stick/WASD: Move around
Right stick/Arrow keys: Camera
Cross button/Spacebar: Jump (hold to jump your full height)
Square button/Enter: Interact
Start button/Escape: Pause game/menu

This is a student project for SAE Perth's Diploma of Game Development, GAD170 Brief 1, in Trimester 2 of 2022.

The project requires us to make a game in which the character has stats which level up when they succesfuly 'interact' with an object.

Main menu music courtesy of alxd via:
https://soundcloud.com/alxdmusic/game-menu-music

In-Game music courtesy of FrankLoopsDotComLLC via:
https://soundcloud.com/frankloopsdotcomllc/groove-music

All other sound effects, in-game assets and the vast majority of the code provided by me. Four basic scripts (player movement, coins, chests, moving platform) were provided by the institution as a basis but were almost entirely re-written during the course of development.
